清閑: (せいかん) - peaceful; quiet; tranquility; tranquillity
清音: (せいおん) - unvoiced sound; voiceless sound
清風: (せいふう) - breath of fresh air; cool (refreshing) breeze
清風明月: (せいふうめいげつ) - (yoji) refreshing breeze and the bright moon; a beautiful nocturnal scene with a full moon
渇く: (かわく) - to be thirsty/to feel thirsty; (often as 〜に渇いた) to thirst for/to crave
渇しても盗泉の水を飲まず: (かっしてもとうせんのみずをのまず) - Even if thirsty not to drink from "Robber's Spring"; A proverb meaning not to lower oneself to unjust acts no matter how desperate; (English equivalent) The eagle does not hunt flies
渇す: (かっす) - to be thirsty; to be dry
渇する: (かっする) - to be thirsty; to be dry
渇を癒やす: (かつをいやす) - to quench one's thirst
渇望者: (かつぼうしゃ) - desiring person; luster
渇筆: (かっぴつ) - drybrush; brush which gives a blurred effect in writing or painting
済し崩し: (なしくずし) - paying back in installments (instalments)/amortization plan (amortisation); gradual reduction/little by little
済ます: (すます) - to finish/to get it over with/to conclude; to settle/to pay back; (often with で) to get along (without something)/to make do with (without)
済ませる: (すませる) - to finish; to make an end of; to get through with; to let end
済まない: (すまない) - inexcusable/unjustifiable/unpardonable; sorry/remorseful/apologetic/conscience-stricken/contrite; excuse me/(I'm) sorry/thank you
済みません: (すみません) - excuse me/pardon me/I'm sorry; thank you
済む: (sumu) - terminar, acabar, ser concluído; apenas resultar em algo menos grave do que o esperado, terminar, acabar, ser concluído; apenas resultar em algo menos grave do que o esperado; sentir-se à vontade; sentir desconforto ou culpa por incomodar alguém, sentir-se arrependido
済世: (せいせい) - saving the world; promoting national welfare
済民: (さいみん) - relieving the sufferings of the people
渉る: (わたる) - (usu. 渡る or 渉る) to cross over/to go across; (usu. 亘る or 亙る)  to extend/to cover/to range/to span
渉外: (shougai) - relações públicas, contato com clientes, relacionamento com clientes
渉外係: (しょうがいがかり) - liaison officer; public relations man
渉外部: (しょうがいぶ) - liaison department; public relations department
渉猟: (しょうりょう) - ranging over or scouting out a territory; searching far and wide (for); reading extensively
渋い: (shibui) - astringent, bitter, puckery, rough, harsh, tart; austere, elegant (e discreto), refined, quiet (and simple), sober, sombre, subdued, tasteful (in a quiet way), understated , astringent, bitter, puckery, rough, harsh, tart; austere, elegant (and unobtrusive), refined, quiet (and simple), sober, sombre, subdued, tasteful (in a quiet way), understated; sour (look), glum, grim, sullen, sulky; stingy, tight-fisted
渋い酒: (しぶいさけ) - rough wine; cheap wine
渋い顔をする: (しぶいかおをする) - to frown (on); to be grim-faced; to look sullen
渋り腹: (しぶりばら) - bowel pains; painful loose bowels
渋る: (しぶる) - to hesitate/to hold back/to balk/to falter; to be reluctant/to be unwilling/to begrudge; to have loose painful bowel movement/to suffer from tenesmus
渋団扇: (しぶうちわ) - fan varnished with persimmon juice
渋抜き: (しぶぬき) - removing the astringent taste (from persimmons)
渋滞緩和: (じゅうたいかんわ) - alleviation of congestion (esp. traffic)
渋皮: (しぶかわ) - inner, astringent skin (of a chestnut)
渋皮がむける: (しぶかわがむける) - (a woman) to lose her roughness and become urbane and good-looking; to become experienced in worldly affairs
渋皮が剥ける: (しぶかわがむける) - (a woman) to lose her roughness and become urbane and good-looking; to become experienced in worldly affairs
渋皮のむけた女: (しぶかわのむけたおんな) - urbane and good-looking woman
渋皮の剥けた女: (しぶかわのむけたおんな) - urbane and good-looking woman
渋紙: (しぶがみ) - paper treated with astringent persimmon juice
渋茶: (しぶちゃ) - strong or bitter (green) tea
渋草: (しぶくさ) - Japanese dock (a plant) (Rumex japonicus)
渓壑: (けいがく) - ravine/chasm; ravenous desire/insatiable desire
渓声: (けいせい) - sound of a valley stream
渓水: (けいすい) - mountain stream; the water of a mountain stream
渓泉: (けいせん) - a spring that gushes forth from a valley
渓流: (keiryuu) - riacho de montanha, torrente de montanha
渓流釣り: (けいりゅうづり) - mountain stream fishing
渓谷: (keikoku) - valley (com um rio passando por ele), gorge, ravine, canyon
渚: (しょ) - Praia, beira d'água, praia, costa
渚伝い: (なぎさづたい) - along the shore
減じる: (げんじる) - to subtract; to deduct; to reduce; to decrease
減ずる: (げんずる) - to decrease; to reduce; to subtract
減らし目: (へらしめ) - decreasing the number of stitches (knitting)
減らず口: (へらずぐち) - impudent talk; speaking without thinking; continuing talking even after one has lost an argument; (getting in) the last word; talking back; needless retort
減り張り: (メリハリ) - modulation (of voice); variation/variety; liveliness/full-bodied
減り込む: (めりこむ) - to sink into; to cave in
減る: (へる) - to decrease (in size or number); to diminish; to abate
減るもんじゃない: (へるもんじゃない) - it's no big deal; it's nothing to fret about; it's not like it's the end of the world
減作: (げんさく) - (ant: 増作) poor crop; diminished yield
減価償却費: (げんかしょうきゃくひ) - depreciation cost; depreciation expense
